pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:0.6: Ime kho panāyyāyo chasaṭṭhisatā pācittiyā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarena upāsakena bhikkhunisaṃgho lasuṇena pavārito hoti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:1.5: “sace bhikkhuniyo āgacchanti, ekamekāya bhikkhuniyā dvetayo bhaṇḍike dehī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:1.6: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṃ ussavo hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:1.13: Thullanandā bhikkhunī khettaṃ gantvā na mattaṃ jānitvā bahuṃ lasuṇaṃ harāpesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:1.15: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo na mattaṃ jānitvā bahuṃ lasuṇaṃ harāpessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:1.16: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tassa khettapālassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:1.17: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:1.18: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā na mattaṃ jānitvā bahuṃ lasuṇaṃ harāpessatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:1.19: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī na mattaṃ jānitvā bahuṃ lasuṇaṃ harāpetī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:1.22: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī na mattaṃ jānitvā bahuṃ lasuṇaṃ harāpessati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:1.25: “Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa pajāpati ahosi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:1.28: Atha kho, bhikkhave, so brāhmaṇo kālaṃ katvā aññataraṃ haṃsayoniṃ upapajji.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:1.31: Atha kho, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī ‘ayaṃ haṃso amhākaṃ ekekaṃ pattaṃ detī’ti taṃ haṃsarājaṃ gahetvā nippattaṃ akāsi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:1.32: Tassa puna jāyamānā pattā setā sampajjiṃsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:1.33: Tadāpi, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī atilobhena suvaṇṇā parihīnā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:1.39: Atha kho bhagavā thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:1.40: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
